simultaneously."},{"lineNumber":126942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んぐーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmph!?\""},{"lineNumber":126943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これはっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-this is...!\""},{"lineNumber":126944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねーねー、また作ってよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, make it again, okay?"},{"lineNumber":126945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの口に入れた瞬間金色に輝くおはぎー」","translatedEnglishLine":"The ohagi that shines golden the moment it enters your mouth!\""},{"lineNumber":126946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人生観が変わりかねないくらい美味しかったの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was so delicious it could change your outlook on life."},{"lineNumber":126947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ね、お願い」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please?\""},{"lineNumber":126948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーもー！　近づかないで下さいまし！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez! Please don’t come near me!\""},{"lineNumber":126949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ、待って待ってー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":126950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待ってー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait!\""},{"lineNumber":126951,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、城内ではチルディを追いかける","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, inside the castle, they would sometimes be seen chasing after Chirudi."},{"lineNumber":126952,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人の姿を時折見るようになったという。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was said that they were occasionally spotted."},{"lineNumber":126953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仲良しさん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Close friends?\""},{"lineNumber":126954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「甘いもの好きの同志……ですかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Comrades who love sweets... perhaps?\""},{"lineNumber":126955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっふふー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn fufuu♪"},{"lineNumber":126956,"originalJapaneseLine":"　抜き足、差し足、忍び足ー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tiptoe, sneak step, stealthy footsteps♪\""},{"lineNumber":126957,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の台所に","translatedEnglishLine":"Into the kitchen of Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":126958,"originalJapaneseLine":"折女がこそこそと忍び込んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Orihime was sneaking in quietly."},{"lineNumber":126959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、折女さん、どうかしました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Orihime-san, what’s the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":126960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いいのいいの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it’s nothing, really."},{"lineNumber":126961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お気になさらずー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t worry about it.\""},{"lineNumber":126962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...\""},{"lineNumber":126963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おやぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":126964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おやおやおやおやぁー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, oh my, oh my my?\""},{"lineNumber":126965,"originalJapaneseLine":"目ざとく折女が見つけたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Orihime's sharp eyes spotted"},{"lineNumber":126966,"originalJapaneseLine":"整然と並べられたあん団子だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a neatly arranged row of sweet red bean dumplings."},{"lineNumber":126967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んふふ、こう見えて折女ねーさん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nfufu, despite appearances, Orihime-nee-san,"},{"lineNumber":126968,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おはぎだけでなく餡ドーナツもあんころもちも、","translatedEnglishLine":"not only loves ohagi but also red bean donuts and anko rice cakes,"},{"lineNumber":126969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　餡と名のつくお菓子はなんでも好きよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"she likes any sweet that has 'anko' in its name.\""},{"lineNumber":126970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、いっただきー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then, I’m going to eat—\""},{"lineNumber":126971,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、それは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that’s!\""},{"lineNumber":126972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぴごーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pigooo!?\""},{"lineNumber":126973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、私の作ったお団子で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W- with the dumplings I made...\""},{"lineNumber":126974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":126975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……大丈夫、ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":126976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぴ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pi...\""},{"lineNumber":126977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ぴ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...pi?\""},{"lineNumber":126978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぴぽぽー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pipopo?\""},{"lineNumber":126979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":126980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　なんか騒がしいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? It’s noisy for some reason.\""},{"lineNumber":126981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽっぴぷー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poppipuu♪\""},{"lineNumber":126982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、ランスだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it’s Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":126983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、ラッキー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, lucky!\""},{"lineNumber":126984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――じゃない、何してるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Wait, no, what are you doing?"},{"lineNumber":126985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女の子がはしたない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Girls behaving improperly.\""},{"lineNumber":126986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ストリーキングという奴か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this what they call streaking?"},{"lineNumber":126987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前にそんな趣味があったとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn’t know you had such a hobby...\""},{"lineNumber":126988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽぽ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Popo?\""},{"lineNumber":126989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽ、ぽ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Po, po?\""},{"lineNumber":126990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーん、折女さん、駄目ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah, Orihime-san, no!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの人がそんな女にあたしを変えちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That person changed me into such a woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最近はすっかり忘れてたくらい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lately, I had almost completely forgotten about it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、おはぎの前に甘い話をごちそうさま」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, thank you for the sweet story before the ohagi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そだそだ、折角のおはぎだもん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, since it's a special ohagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな話より食べよ食べよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's eat instead of talking about such things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は同時に手を合わせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two put their hands together at the same time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時におはぎにかぶりついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and bit into the ohagi simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの口に入れた瞬間金色に輝くおはぎー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ohagi that shines golden the moment it enters your mouth!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人生観が変わりかねないくらい美味しかったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was so delicious it could change your outlook on life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーもー！　近づかないで下さいまし！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez! Please don’t come near me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、城内ではチルディを追いかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, inside the castle, they would sometimes be seen chasing after Chirudi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の姿を時折見るようになったという。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was said that they were occasionally spotted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「甘いもの好きの同志……ですかね？」
抜き足、差し足、忍び足ー♪」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Into the kitchen of Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 折女がこそこそと忍び込んでいた。
「あら、折女さん、どうかしました？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, oh my, oh my my?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目ざとく折女が見つけたのは、
整然と並べられたあん団子だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a neatly arranged row of sweet red bean dumplings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふ、こう見えて折女ねーさん、
おはぎだけでなく餡ドーナツもあんころもちも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not only loves ohagi but also red bean donuts and anko rice cakes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 餡と名のつくお菓子はなんでも好きよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she likes any sweet that has 'anko' in its name."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、いっただきー」
「ストリーキングという奴か。
お前にそんな趣味があったとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn’t know you had such a hobby..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
